title: Black treacle brushed pork, crushed butterbeans and Devon cider apple sauce
description: Pork and apple is a classic combination, use good quality cider to make this dish extra special.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
150ml/5floz dry Devon cider, such as Ashridge
2 tbsp apple sauce or apple purée
1 Braeburn apple, peeled, core removed, chopped
